# Setup

```{r packages}
sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "raster", "ows4R", "here"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)

source(here("R", "download_fisbroker_metadata.R"))
```


# Data

```{r data}
imp <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "landuse_imperviousness_berlin_2015_3035",
                   "landuse_imperviousness_berlin_2015_3035.gpkg"))

berlin_district <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "berlin_districts_2020_3035", "berlin_districts_2020_3035.gpkg"))

temp_ras <- raster(here("data-proc", "berlin", "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035", "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035.tif"))

imp_ras <- raster::rasterize(x = imp %>% as("Spatial"),
                            y = temp_ras,
                                   field = "VG")

plot(imp_ras)

imp_ras[is.na(imp_ras)] <- 0

imp_ras_mask <- raster::mask(x = imp_ras, 
                                 mask = berlin_district,
                                 updatevalue = NA
                                 )

plot(imp_ras_mask)

create_meta_raster(imp_ras_mask, 
                   name = "imperviousness_berlin_raster_10m",
                   date = "2015",
                   epsg = "3035",
                   units = "percentage of imperviousness per cell",
                   descr = NA,
                   source = here("data-raw", "berlin", "landuse_imperviousness_berlin_2015_3035",
                   "landuse_imperviousness_berlin_2015_3035.gpkg"),
                   d_down = NA,
                   mod = "NAs (zero values) inside Berlin borders where set to 0",
                   path = "data-proc/berlin",
                   folder = TRUE)

writeRaster(imp_ras_mask, here("data-proc", "berlin", "imperviousness_berlin_raster_10m_2015_3035", "imperviousness_berlin_raster_10m_2015_3035.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
```
